posts.post_content:
Folks, I am down to needing just one card for my T209 I (Color) set.  Just one!  If anyone has a T209 I Gilmore to sell, please let me know.  Condition is really not important: I'd probably buy two-thirds of a T209 I Gilmore at this point.

[url]sethgbernard@yahoo.com[/url]

Edited: for those type collectors holding on to an example, I've got T209 I cards to trade!

Thanks!
Seth
Post after a week with no luck, I'm dyin' here!  One card away...be my hero...
